title: The Anatomy of Costume (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
The Anatomy of Costume
Crescent Books | 1988 | ISBN: 0517223686 | English | 144 pages | PDF | 27 MB


A colourful picture history of clothing and accessories, which shows the development of style and fashion from the inside out. From Egyptian to modern times the clothes that set the style are described and explained in a most unusual way. The authoritative text by Robert Selbie, who has been involved for many years with theatre costume and design, is perfectly combined with splendidly detailed and annotated drawings by Victor Ambrus
